utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!! None of that, not while you're living under my roof!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, just because I know about you two, doesn't mean I like looking at it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aren't you supposed to be at an audition for another hour?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I'm sorry if I'm not a middle-aged black woman! And I'm also sorry if sometimes I go to the wrong audition! Okay, look, if I have to pretend I don't know about you two, then you two are gonna have to pretend there's nothing to know about.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can hear that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel's at work.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can still hear you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, what's that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, my mom sent me a family heirloom that once belonged to my grandmother. Can you believe it?! A year ago I didn't even have a family, and now I have heirlooms for crying out loud.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Eeeee--ohh!! God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Argh-argh!! Ooh, soft. Is this mink?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Why would my mother send me a fur? Doesn't she know me but at all! Plus, I have a perfectly fine coat that no innocent animal suffered to make!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, just some 9-year-old Filipino kids who worked their fingers bloody for 12 cents an hour. That didn't happen, I made that up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Oh, Ross? Ross! You can't put up flyers in here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How come? Everybody else does.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: You can't.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, umm, I'm just getting rid of a couple of things.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is all of your things.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes it is! No, but it's good it's—Emily thinks we should get all new stuff. Stuff that's just ours, together. Y'know brand new.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So basically, this is a getting-rid-of-everything-Rachel-ever-used sale.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Touched. Used. Sat on. Sleep on.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: I'll take it all.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Ross, you're okay with that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, if I can just do what Emily wants and get her to New York, I'm sure everything will be fine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but don't you think this is a little extreme?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: After what I did? Can you blame her?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! You got off easy! When my friend Silvie's husband said someone else's name in bed, she cursed him and turned his thingy green.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What is he doing? What, Emily, thinks Ross's furniture has got Rachel coodies?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now calm down Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! Everything's gettin' all messed up, y'know? Emily won't let Ross see Rachel, we're not gonna stop seeing Rachel, hence Ross stops seeing us!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I hate this. Everything's changing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah I know, we're losing Ross, Joey said hence…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look, I'm not happy about this either, but y'know if-if Ross says he's happy then we're just gonna have to keep our feelings about Emily to ourselves. Are you cool with that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! But y'know, I'm an actor, I'll act cool.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, whoa God! Storage rooms give me the creeps! Monica, come on please hurry up honey! Please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, if you want the little round waffles, you gotta have to wait until I find the little waffle iron.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I want the little round waffles.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right. Op, here it is! Right underneath the can of-of bug bomb. I wonder if the best place to put something that cooks food is underneath the can of poison?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y'know what? I'll-I'll have toast!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Arghhhh!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Fog him! Fog him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't know what I'm gonna do about this coat.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'll take it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That might work!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh-ooh-ooh, yeah! Enh? All right, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're on in 5 Ms. Minnelli.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no-no, it's just a bit sudden. No, it's great. Okay? I'm totally on board. I love you too, all righty. Bye.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's the matter Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nothing. Oh, actually, great news! I just got off the phone with Emily and it looks like I'm moving to a new apartment. Woo-hoo!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, her thought is, and I agree, fresh new furniture, why not a fresh new apartment? Her cousin has this great place to sublet, it's got a view of the river on one side and Columbia on the other.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's way uptown! That's like three trains away! Which is great! I love to ride that rail!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you're really okay with this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes! Yes! I mean it's-it's kinda far from work, but uh, y'know, I'll get so much done on the commute. I-I've been given the gift of time!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now that's so funny, because last Christmas I got the gift of space. We should get them together and make a continuum.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now he's movin'? Man, what is Emily doing to him? Ow!! He's not even here!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You guys! You guys!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We were, we were just in the storage area and we saw this really creepy man!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It was like this crazy-eyed, hairy beast man! He was like a, like a bigfoot or a yeti or something!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And he came at us with an axe, so Rachel had to use a bug bomb on him!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I-I just pulled the tab and I just fogged his yeti ass!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, like dark hair, bushy beard?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you fogged Danny.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Please! We did not fog Danny! Who's Danny?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dan just moved in downstairs. Yeah, he just got back from like this four-month trek in the Andes. Nice fella.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh he's nice. He's nice! Y'know, you always stick up for the people we fog!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! You might not remember us, but we are the girls that fogged you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're-we're really sorry we fogged you.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Just so you know, we-we didn't mean to fog you, we thought you were like a yeti or something.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Yesss?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Sorry to bother you, but I don't think we can accept your acceptance of our apology, it just doesn't really seem like you mean it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: O-kay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! That guy is so rude!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really! What is with that guy? I mean you'd forgive me if I fogged you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well you did a little bit.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, honey, I'm so sorry!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I totally forgive you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So listen, you know my friend Chris who owns the crematorium?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Crematorium Chris? Sure!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He says, that he would cremate my fur coat for free if I umm, y'know, bring in the next person I know who dies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God, look at these pelts!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't get too attached, she's having it cremated.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Uhh, Phoebe, honey, honey, I know you're quirky and I get a big kick out of it, we all do actually, but if you destroy a coat like this that is like a crime against nature! Not nature, fashion!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is fashion?! Okay, so to you, death is fashion?! That's really funny. Here's Phoebe umm, sporting uh, y'know, cutting edge hairy carcass from y'know, the steal traps of wintry Russia. I mean, you really thing this looks good? 'Cause I do.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know I miss you too. I can't wait to see you. I love you. Bye.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, what is in here? Rocks?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no, this is my collection of fossil samples.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, rocks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm really gonna miss this apartment. Y'know, Ben-Ben took his first steps right over there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh. Hey, remember when I ran into this thing and it kinda knocked me out a little?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I loved this place! To tell you the truth, I wish I didn't have to move.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, are you saying that you're not entirely happy about this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I mean if uh, if Emily gave me a choice…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You do have a choice!! Ross, why are you listening to her?! Are you, are you crazy?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's not right what Emily wants you to do! She is totally--Owww!! Stop pinching me! Look, now you guys said I only had to keep my mouth shut as long as Ross was happy, right? Well he just told me that he's not entirely happy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We all hate Emily!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nooo!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, Ross, we do not hate Emily. We-we just, we just think that you're having to sacrifice a whole lot to make her happy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, we just think that maybe she's being a little unreasonable.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes! Yes! Unreasonable!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I think he's right. You guys hang out at the coffeehouse way too much.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: God, I feel so guilty about Ross.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I kinda feel like it's my fault.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kind of? If you just kept this to yourself none of this would've happened.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I'm keeping so many things to myself these days, something was bound to slip out!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I think it's very brave what you said.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I can't sit here anymore. I have to walk places.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pheebs, what are you doing with the coat? How about the whole animal rights thing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I've been reading up and for your information, minks are not very nice. Okay, I admit it! I love this coat! Okay, I—it's the best thing I've ever had wrapped around me, including Phil Huntley! Remember Phil Huntley? He was fine!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: So you like the short hair better.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Yeti—I mean Danny?

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: I had to cut my hair to get rid of the uh, fogger smell.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Listen, I'm so sorry. I would, I would've never fogged you if y'know if you hadn't looked so…. Y'know.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Absolutely. Some people are just into appearances.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: That's cool. Cool.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Hey! No-no-no! This not cool! You don't even know me!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Come on, you got the shopping bags and the Sack's catalog.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So from that you think you've got me all figured out? Well, you don't! Y'know I-I could have toys for underprivileged kids in here!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Do you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y'know, if-if kids like to play with Capri pants.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And stop saying that! I hate that!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine! I judged you. I made a snap judgement. But you did it too! And you are worse because you are sticking to your stupid snap judgement! You can't even open up your mind for a second to see if you're wrong! What does that say about you?

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: The pizza-place across the street any good?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: I'm hungry. Wanna get some pizza? You can keep yelling if there's more.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Stop saying that. I hate that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, Ross?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you still mad at us?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yep.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh good! Because we have an "I'm sorry" song.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what? I'm really not in the mood.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, Ross, I feel really bad. I mean, you're going through all this stuff and I just acted like a jerk.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, we are so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're kinda stepping on the song.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, we were way out of line, we totally support you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Whatever you decide, whatever you do.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, now you're just taking lines right out of the song!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, this is hard enough! I really need you guys right now.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes! Exactly! And that's why…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you come over tonight? And I'll make you favorite dinner.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Thanks you guys. Pheebs are you wearing fur?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, let's get some perspective people; it's not like I'm wearing a seeing-eye dog coat!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, y'know Ross, I think I kinda understand why I kinda lost it today.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You do, huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah you see umm, well, I'm an actor. Right? So I gotta keep my emotions right at the surface y'know? See what I'm saying? I gotta lot of balls in the air. Y'know what I mean? It's tough! Guys like me, y'know, you wander around, you're alone…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you talking about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm not sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, look at you! Where have you been?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I went to have pizza. With Danny.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How did that happen?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That yeti is one smooth talker.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I hope you're not full, 'cause dinner's almost ready.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know I-I think I'm just gonna hang out in my room.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: No! Why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on you guys! Listen, if Emily knew I was here having dinner you with you she would flip out and you know it. It's okay, I really… I don't mind.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait! Wait! Wait! Y'know what? Just stay. Please? It uh… It would really mean a lot to me if you stayed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: RACHEL PLEASE!!! JUST HAVE DINNER WITH US!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Joey, it's okay. Settle down.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I-I'm sorry. I'm sorry. You see Rach I'm an actor…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Hey, look! Ugly Naked Guy's back!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I haven't seen him in so long!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh God, I really missed that fat bastard!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, this is so weird. I just realized this might be the last time we'll all be hanging out together.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's almost as if he knew.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll get it. Hello. Hi Emily! Yeah, uh you-you tracked him down. Hold on one second.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Yeah-yeah, we're just having dinner. Uh, yeah, sure uh hold on. She wants to say hi. Hold on.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi Emily!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Hello everyone. So who am I saying hello too?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well uh, I don't know about who's here, but I can tell you for damn sure who's not here and that's Rachel!!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Well, I should hope not. Ross knows better than that by now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what? Uh, Rachel is here!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: She's there?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, there-there she is!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, she's here.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ross, take me off speakerphone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: How can you do this too me?! I thought I'd made my feelings about Rachel perfectly clear!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look Emily, I'm just having dinner with my friends, okay?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: You obviously can't keep away from her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Emily that's ridiculous. Look, I'm-I'm moving for you, I'm cutting friends out of my life for you. Please, just get on the plane and come to New York. Okay, you'll see you're the only person I want to be with.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I'll feel better when I'm there, and I can know where you are all the time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, you can't know where I am all the time. Look, this marriage is never gonna work if you don't trust me.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: You're right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, can you trust me?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think it's going okay. Looks like he's smiling.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How can you tell? You can only see the back of his head!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I guess that's it.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Why, what happened?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What happened? What happened?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My marriage is over.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, sweetie. Oh, look at you. You're shivering.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, honey, is there anything we can do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. You can help me get my furniture back from Gunther.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, stop tormenting me! This mink! Okay, they're mean! And they hate squirrels! And y'know, okay, most of these probably wanted to be coats! All right, fine, now I get it. Here. You take it. Are you happy now? I'm cold!
